page.title: 18Outdoor games
page.content: In{ROUNDERS}there are two teams. One team fields and one team bats. There are four posts and a person who bowls you a ball and you have to hit it and run to the first post.Then the next person hits the ball and runs to the first post and if you hit it really far you might get a rounder. {BLACK PETER}There is one person in the middle of the playground and other people run to the other side of the wall and the person in the middle has to catch them.And they they cant go back and.When they have caught them all the first person who was caught first is it.
